courses.title: Piano Essentials
courses.description: Master the fundamentals of piano playing with step-by-step lessons for beginners.

courses.title: Music Theory Basics
courses.description: Understand the building blocks of music including scales, chords, and rhythm.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create beats and tracks using popular DAWs like Ableton and FL Studio.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Improve your vocal range, tone, and confidence with guided vocal exercises.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation Techniques
courses.description: Learn to improvise like a pro with jazz scales, phrasing, and soloing tips.

courses.title: Drumming Fundamentals
courses.description: Explore rhythm, timing, and basic drum patterns for acoustic and electronic kits.

courses.title: Songwriting Masterclass
courses.description: Craft compelling lyrics and melodies with guidance from award-winning songwriters.

courses.title: Classical Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Refine your fingerstyle and classical repertoire with expert instruction.

courses.title: Mixing and Mastering
courses.description: Polish your tracks with professional mixing and mastering workflows.

courses.title: World Music Exploration
courses.description: Discover musical traditions from around the globe and learn to play ethnic instruments.
